snippet.title: Snake Cubed - Android Game
snippet.description:
Snake Cubed is mobile game (Currently only developed for Android, but this will change should I get my hands on any Apple hardware) based on the traditional snake game, only wrapped around a cube.

- Traditional Snake wrapped around a freely rotating cube
- 3 Game Modes - Classic, Rooms, and Gauntlet
- 2 Control Schemes - Tap, and Swipe
- Google play integrated Leaderboards and Achievements
- Multiple colour themes - Citadel, Mono, Hotline, and Saloon (so far)
- Designed for both Landscape and Portrait screen orientations
- Music and SFX by Reckoning Storm Audioworks

Download now from Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cubed.snake.android

Visit the Official Page for more information:
http://little-joseph.tumblr.com/snake-cubed
